name: Smash n Beat
description:
Enjoy the magic world scene with cute fairy and music in the background.


A lastest addictive music game! Let’s install SMASH N BEAT and enjoy the simple gameplay to relax with the trending music genre: EDM, Deephouse, Trap, R&B, Pop, Rock...and more!


MAIN FEATURES:
* Popular music sound-track.
* Easy gameplay and quick fitting.
* Game designed in 3D with cute graphics.
* Challenging your skill.
